title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: When searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed. However, searching via the context menu in the packages view works properly. It should be noted that when searching, the search should first attempt to retrieve the Java element and if that fails, display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
OB: When searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed.
EB: The search should display the expected results when searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog.
SR:
1. Open the Package view selection and dialog.
2. Perform a search for declarations.
3. Verify that no results are displayed.
4. Alternatively, perform the same search via the context menu in the packages view and verify that the expected results are displayed.
